mapper.select: select pno,email,pcontent,pstyle, ptype, photo_image, photo_simage, to_char(pdate,'yyyy.mm.dd')pdate, phits from h_photo where pno=#{pno}
mapper.update: update h_photo set phits = phits+1 where pno=#{pno}
mapper.select: select nickname, member_spimage, intro from h_member, h_photo where h_member.email=h_photo.email and pno=#{pno}

select rownum rno, pno, photo_simage from(select rownum rno, pno, photo_simage from h_photo where email in (select h_member.email from h_member,h_photo where h_member.email=h_photo.email and pno=#{pno}) order by pdate) where rownum between 1 and 4
select count(*) from h_photo where email=#{email} and pno=#{pno}
